text: “I muli Dimaadua di godou God dela ma ga hagabagi digaula gi daha mo godou mua, gei goodou hudee bida hagamamaanadu i lodo godou manawa boloo, ‘Gidaadou la digau hai hegau donu, dela gei Dimaadua gaa dugu mai gi gidaadou gi hai mee gi tenua deenei.’ Deeai, Dimaadua ne hagabagi digaula gi daha mo godou mua, idimaa digaula digau huaidu.
